attributes.action: stop propping up Northern Rock and get all this money back to keep existing specialist maternity baby units in hospitals open to save the lives of mother's and babies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop propping up Northern Rock and get all this money back to keep existing specialist maternity baby units in hospitals open to save the lives of mother's and babies

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NorthernRockBank/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
